website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for above-ground pools, and a good choice for consumers who don't need an advanced model for a basic pool.
pros: Easy to set up, effective for most above-ground pools, and reasonably priced
cons: Pools larger than 30 ft. may need larger attachment hoses
Vacuuming action slows when the pool filter needs cleaning
May take 24 hours to clean entire pool
Doesn't always do a thorough job in pools with creases and uneven surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Wanda works!
customer_reviews.text: Just watch the video! You will see her at work. Fair warning: YOU NEED A PUMP THAT MOVES THIS THING. Otherwise she will just stay still. I had a 1050 GPM and wasn't moving her at all. So, I bought a 3000 GPM and look at her go!
customer_reviews.author: laura ortega

customer_reviews.title: Wotks great for our pool
customer_reviews.text: Love this little vacume. I was worried I might have trouble with it since we have some low spots and wrinkles but it works great. Cleaned the bottom in a little over 2 hours and I didn't have to mess with it. Only problem is it won't hook into the inlets on the Coleman pool we have so we have to hook it up into the pump and run the hose over the side of the pool. Hoping to find a "t" with a valve on it so we can leave it hooked up all the time and not have to keep switching the hoses around.
customer_reviews.author: VALVAL

customer_reviews.title: Wanda does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd above ground vacuum in 5 years. After reading reviews I was more afraid of it tearing the liner than anything else. I agree about the tail, it's difficult to get it in, so I can see why it doesn't stay on, that's the reason for the 4 starts instead of 5, in easy to assemble. . That aside, it works wonders. I had just opened my pool and it needed to be vacuumed. I added the leaf canister and I am one happy girl. With the additional hose, it gets to my entire pool and doesn't get tangled. She chugs along around the bottom happy as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for long
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 2 hours and then it did nothing but sit in the bottom of the pool. I’m good at figuring out issues but this ending up getting quickly returned.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered wanda through Amazon, and I set it up the first day it arrived. It did not work with a 1500 gph pump, so I hooked it up to a 2500 gph pump and it ran for a few hours, then stopped. I checked the connections, checked for air in the hose, cleaned the filter, etc. and it just sat there, not moving. I returned it, and here's the kicker: they want 20% restocking fee. The company that sells this through Amazon is "The Swim Pool Supplies". Be cautious, be really cautious.
customer_reviews.author: Striving for Good

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money or your time on this - just buy the cheaper hose with a head on it. Wanda hardly moved at all. If it did move it would be for a minute or 2 and stop. Doesn't pick up sand or hardly anything. A wrinkle in your liner will stop it. I spent more time trying to get it moving than I do now manually vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: debhut

customer_reviews.title: Won't budge
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I try I cannot get her to move around my pool. The first one I ordered had no suction. Returned it and got a new one. The suction works, but she still won't move. I even ordered the cork style pieces to replace the rubber ones as was recommended. She gets the one spot she stays in clean.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Pitt

customer_reviews.title: Clean the large leaves and debis out with your net. Too much heavy debris can clog her.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I did not use the hose vacuum gauge. I turn the pump on to fill hose water from the pump discharge nozzle in the pool. Turn the pump off, holding the hose under the water as best I can and then connecting to skimmer inlet. Works wonderfully and she has are floor pool floor clean in about an hour. She is easy to clean with a garden hose. If she stop moving alot, look to see if her aft screen is clogged up. Just hose it out to clear. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kuzma

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how this got good reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, most Hayward products I've had are great, not this one. First off tail won't stay on. Put in pool and it moved way to fast., come to find out my pump sucks too much water so had to purchase a separate valve regulator from Hayward for 20. So added that, put in water and the cleaner tips over constantly!!! You have to babysit it. Wish I could send it back. Completely junk. Better off cleaning with manual vac. Don't buy!! I went off the reviews too
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: We have an Intex above ground pool. 20'×48" We bought Wanda to clean dead algae from the bottom of the pool after adding HTH green to blue shock. It did not work from day one. We thought that maybe our pool pump was too small so we invested in the 16 inch sand filter pump(more money spent), it still didn't work. We then called in a professional pool service and they couldn't get it to work either. Save your money and sanity hire a pool service to vaccum your pool(my pool company charges $35.00 very two weeks) to come home to a chemically balanced clean pool. All you have to do is jump in and swim!!!
customer_reviews.author: sherryamurray1

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Wanda does a good job, but if you notice that there is still debris on the bottom of your pool, you need to look inside of the whale. Ours had an acorn stuck in the vacuum hole on the underneath side, but once it was removed we haven't had anymore problems. I will say this, if you've ever had a Polaris you may be slightly disappointed with the performance of Wanda. There's more to clean up with this product than with the Polaris turtle that we had. It had a debris bag attached, this goes straight into your return. Watch a video before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Cheap pile of plastic junk..
customer_reviews.text: Dont believe what other say or post pictures of this miracle vacuum because ts all BS! I had it 3 times in my 15x25 pool and all 3 times it ran in circles and in 3 hours, cleaned about a third! Junk, junk and one more time, JUNK! I have a Home Depot triangle vacuum head and i vacuum the whole pool in less than 15 minutes! So if you're fat and lazy, get this and enjoy a whole day of a 'maybe' cleaned pool..
customer_reviews.author: WilliamEks

customer_reviews.title: It worked twice last year and just opened the pool ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked twice last year and just opened the pool and of course, it doesn't work! I plan to mail it to the CEO of the company so they can see the junk they sell. Problem is that the pool rovers, are more expensive and don't last one summer either. We don't use the pool that much, going back to the old fashioned way. Don't buy, it will only work once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Need a Major Pump for this to Work Well
customer_reviews.text: It's ok when it works but it gives me a lot of trouble. It could be that my pump is not strong enough but when I can get it to move, it stops a lot and I have to babysit it. And all the little tiny fern-like leaves that fall in my pool clog up the filter so that it stops working. There is supposedly a leaf filter you can add to it, but that probably would not work for tiny leaves and debris. Unless you've got a major pump, I would not recommend it. I'm back to the water vacuum with the bag, its more work but it picks up everything.
customer_reviews.author: anniecoz

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long...die within 10 months!
customer_reviews.text: The pumped worked so well at first and then within the year it just stopped working. I am trying to get ahold of the company for a refund or a replacement since there is a warranty, but it has been a headache. I would pass on this pump or find another company with a good warranty because the pump will not last. I wish I knew this before spending almost 300.00 on a product not meant to last. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Insight

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: When setting up the unit, the hoses that carry the debris from the pool, kept falling apart, while still on my deck, had not been submerged yet. The unit worked perfectly for about 30 seconds and then stopped. it had 8 - 10 small leaves in it that caused the unit to stop. Removed the leaves, the unit ran for approximately 30 seconds more and quit. More leaves. If you only have dust or dirt this unit may be for you. Otherwise, it is not work the money. Get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Papaalpha

customer_reviews.title: So sad that company's do not honor their products anymore
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on 4-6-2017. Used twice during summer of 2017. Stored in pool house and set it up last month for the 3rd use to start the summer off and all the hoses were cracked!!! Had to have gotten a defected one. Notified company and they are saying warranty is up. Im sorry but I think for the money I paid I should have gotten more then 3 USES out of this item!!!! They are also saying I purchased item in 2014, when my account clearly says it was purchased on 4/6/2017. So sad that company's do not honor their products anymore!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly M.

customer_reviews.title: Love Wanda!
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 4 stars on the easy to assemble because THE TAIL WILL NOT GO ON! "A Whale with out a tale" Besides that, VERY easy to assemble and use. I do like the pressure tester that comes with it. good it does as my filter has 3 power levels and the mid range speed hit the high end of the preferred pressure range, and works perfectly. Put Wanda in for a 2 to 3 hours, and she does a great job. Some times she seems to favor one side of the pool, so, you have to move her around, but, that only happened twice out of the four times I used her this year.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Downey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Had to give this away. It kept tipping over and we could not risk ruining the liner of the pool. This is supposed to make life less stressful yet it did just the opposite. I even bought other pieces to attempt to stop the tipping, but in the end we always get the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Light

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second summer with Wanda and she has become the bane of my existence. When she works, she's amazing. When she doesn't and I have to go through multiple steps to get her going again, she drives me insane. At the beginning of this summer, she worked great the first few times. Then she stopped. Nothing I've tried has worked - from cleaning the pool filter and basket to hosing her out - she still won't move. For this amount of money I hoped to have it work for at least a handful of years.
customer_reviews.author: GlibLib

customer_reviews.title: Wanda’s my girl
customer_reviews.text: She arrived much quicker than expected. Ordered Friday, due Wednesday arrived Saturday!!! Easy to assemble and she’s doing a great job. I’m a bit obsessive about the pool and so far I’ve been very pleased. I got her to take care of the tiny particles and sand I can’t skim and she does that easily. I agree with the reviewer that said she’s not saving me any time because she’s fun to watch haha. So far I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Not good for above 4 ft ground pools
customer_reviews.text: This thing does not work for a 48” deep above ground pool. It gets caught up every 5 minutes, and even when you stand there and manhandle the hose yourself it runs around and cleans the same spots forever. Maybe it works better for a deeper pool.
customer_reviews.author: trina1999

customer_reviews.title: I would really like this little vacuum except she hugs the ladder
customer_reviews.text: I would really like this little vacuum except she hugs the ladder. I should have known. I can’t raise my ladder because it weighted down with water to stay in the pool. I put Wanda in for the first time this morning and almost right away I had to retrieve her from the ladder. After 4 times I gave up and took her out😦 she cleaned good while she was in there but after 45 minutes of messing with her and the ladder I was done .
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl R Fillmon

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this when we put up our pool the beginning of this summer! Worked for MAYBE one hour. Won’t crawl! Soooo disappointing, so now I have to do it’s work myself and that’s time consuming, back breaking and shoulder/neck hurting! Sooo wanted it to help me out!
customer_reviews.author: Dena Beasley

customer_reviews.title: I find I have to push it the where any ...
customer_reviews.text: I find I have to push it the where any debris is in the pool. It tends to do the same places over and over. My pool is brand new and was professionally installed so I know it's not a matter of the floor being out of level.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sucks up the dirt without clouding the water.
customer_reviews.text: Ready to go out of the box if you don't count putting on the tail (not required). Put it in the pool around 4 p.m. and most of the floor was clean before dark. Even cleaned up some light algae in the middle of the floor. Sucks up what it agitates without clouding the rest of the pool. Seems a lot sturdier than the original Hayward vacuum that came with the pool 15 years ago. I'm sure you can get one without an animal or bug theme but my 5 year old grandson loves it. Would highly recommend even if it cost 50 dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: rdstar

customer_reviews.title: this is a must have for above ground pools!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing EVER! I have an intex ultraframe 18x48 pool. I upgraded to the .50 hp intex sand filter and pump. I installed a Hayward through the wall skimmer and could not be happier! This little gal hooks up in less than a minute to the intake, then does her thing. The bottom of my pool is not perfectly level and there are a couple of decent wrinkles. She has no problem getting over them and keeps my pool spotless!!! Best money I've ever spent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Water Baby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed that it came with the hose too. Although I already had my own hose, it would have cost a small fortune to buy the hose at a local pool place. With that being said, it is nice that they provide a suction relief valve to allow for more powerful pumps. On the down-side, I have had occasional issues where it tips on it's side and tends to get clogged a bit easier than my 10 year old generic looking pool scrubber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an automatic vacuum for the pool after reading all the reviews, I decided this one was the best. We hooked up and she took right off. I had a few problems where she would just clean in the same area, but I think it was my chlorine dispensers, so I tuck them behind the steps and let Wanda go, I let her run overnight & the pool is sparkling clean. Best investment for sure!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Have to babysit this thing... Why have it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work that well in my above ground pool. Sweeps the same area over and over and it always gets stuck when it hits the pool wall. I went back to my old Pool shark. If not, go manual and do it yourself, it’s a lot faster.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: We had the ladybug and just wore her out. We ordered Wanda the whale and away she went. It is a time saver and gets our above ground pool clean in no time. I highly recommend these vacuums We aren't able to get her tail to snap in but it is only decorative and not necessary to her performance. Do wish it would snap in. It looks cute
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product waste of time and money I sent it back cause it did not work at all. And the tail doesn't even fit the whale
customer_reviews.author: Denisse Viteri

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Just keep it running for a while.
customer_reviews.text: Does it a great job of getting the bottom of the pool cleaned up. You may have to leave it for a few hours or maybe the duration you have the pump running but only once or twice a week. The longer its going the more it will clean up. I was told in a couple of hours it should do the job but i find it needs more than that. My pool is a 24' X 4' above ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: SOOO much easier!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just do it... look at that smile... she is telling you “I want to clean your pool!” It as easy as click together some tubes, connect to your filter, put her in, and walk away. I WISH I bought her last summer when I was humming and hawing over her. She just swims across the bottom sucking up EVERYTHING in sight. Our filters were FULL of junk and I’m not sunburnt or aching from pushing and scrubbing a vacuum across my giant pool.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Big piece of JUNK Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: At first it did somewhat ok ,then after a couple of weeks it doesn't work. It goes to the edge and stops, won't turn,the cheapest pool cleaner is the best never had a issue for 4 years, i'll go back to it but this is a piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: L. Akers

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for pools .... intex pools I've heard not so good reviews but a metal pool 100% amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just started using today 6-6-18 at 630pm an it's now 9pm took it out to put away cause bad storm . An checked my filter and omg filter is full of green nasty algae. It's why I purchased it. It's amazing . . Also a good trick for pools 3 magic erasers in skimmer 1 ,two in pool . Omg keeps pool spotless . This product will save me some money on chemical in Louisiana algae is bad . 10********** 🏊‍♀️😍
customer_reviews.author: deedeejenkins

customer_reviews.title: Saved my back! Works great, and easy to hook up!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this little vacuum. Cleans my 24 ft AGP in about 2 hours. I have found that if I put a skimmer filter sock on before I hook Wanda up, it improves her cleaning power because the sock catches even the fine dirt. Using the skimmer sock with Wanda decreases the number of times that I have to back wash the sand filter. I get up in the morning, fix my coffee, hook Wanda up, and by the time breakfast is complete Wanda has the pool ready for the grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Bonnie Serrett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We love our Wanda. Occasionally we have to pull some acorns out when they get lodged in there. Sometimes our Hayward pump pulls a little too hard and the hose will collapse, I then disconnect and try again. I think it might be that there was some air in the hose. I do get the air out before hooking her up. I pick it up by the tail all the time and it has never came off.
customer_reviews.author: K. Krivensky

customer_reviews.title: Save your money— put it towards a better one!
customer_reviews.text: I searched on here for a good above ground pool vacuum that doesn’t break the bank. I thought this would would be good bc it had some great reviews. Advice— save your money. Put it towards a better one. This thing is a pain to get going, then it takes forever to work the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Massey

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre worker
customer_reviews.text: This whale does a good job in MOST of the pool, but seems to neglect the same eighth section everytime, therefore requiring me to use the manual vacuum telepole technique.
customer_reviews.author: +educ8r

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your pump is powerful enough...
customer_reviews.text: You NEED a pool pump powerful enough to make this pool cleaner work so check that before you buy!! Pump needs 1 Horsepower or more. We have no idea if this pump works well or not...we gave it 2 stars only because the product description did not provide this extremely important information.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Howell

customer_reviews.title: It stops working after a year.  I found bearings around area where poolman cleans.
customer_reviews.text: It stops working after a year. I found bearings around area where poolman cleans. I'd like to know if its fixable or what. While it worked it was good. Had to replace the little legs once or twice. I would not buy again. Asking my poolman to get me one he knows works.
customer_reviews.author: Miami customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So we tried out Wanda the Whale today and it appears to be a total success. Set up was super easy. After reading reviews and I made sure to follow the directions exactly. Several people said the fin doesn't stay so after one attempt to get it to attach I left it off. It does not affect how the vacuum works in my opinion. No problem getting it to work on the first try. It did a great job of cleaning out the pool. We'll see how long it lasts but so far totally satisfied. I did buy the leaf attachment so there seems to be exactly enough hose for my 27 feet pool!
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Scott

customer_reviews.title: So Confusing Instructions Of Install
customer_reviews.text: Really Complicated To Install. The Thing Didn’t Sink After Even 5th Attempt; Returned As It Is; Hard To Read Instructions Of Install So Confusing Thing.....
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: 1 star out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Reviews made it seem as if this product deserved a 5 star rating; however, it failed to conquer my satisfaction. When first plugging it in, Wanda quickly starting moving about but after coming back to check on it in 3 hours, it had only cleaned about a three feet area in my pool. My pool is 16x28. I trouble shooted it multiple times and still, would only clean about a 2-3 feet perimeter. It’s upseting as I was very excited about this product. So I have requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Kept stopping on us
customer_reviews.text: I had this one in the past years ago and the new one did not work as well and kept stopping not sure if the quality of the product is being made the same
customer_reviews.author: PowerStorm

customer_reviews.title: Definite waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: Everything I read was misleading. I read that it picked up leaves and sand and worked with above ground pools. I tried it a couple different times in a couple different ways, but iylt doesn't seem to make a difference in my pool. When I started reading the trouble shooting it clearly says it doesn't pick up leaves or and if it does it will make the whale not work... then it says you may need to buy all these other parts to make it work. Definite waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously.... this thing DID NOT WORK ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously....this thing DID NOT WORK. We spent two weeks adjusting it, buying extra parts for it for no reason. It never cleaned the bottom of our pool. After week two, the main attachment to the whale cracked right in two. It's back in the box and getting returned. First Amazon return, ever. Same some time and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Good Above Ground Pool Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Good above ground pool cleaner. I would give it 5 stars, but if your pool isn't absolutely flat on the bottom, Wanda has trouble moving around. Lots of little parts also that fell off of our last Wanda. So far this second one has worked better (New pool with smooth bottom). For the money, it is a good cleaner - which is why we bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Tennies

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my 10x15 pool and I'm happy. If I let it go for 2 or 3 hours, I usually check on it a few times just to make sure it's still moving. Over the whole summer this year, I can count on 1 hand how many times I had to fix it from falling over or getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: LSpliff

customer_reviews.title: It works but eventually gets twisted.
customer_reviews.text: Typical Hayward bug. Always twist the hose into a knot.. By the way asking for a grade on suction? That’s only as good as your filter!
customer_reviews.author: Eric J

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a new house with an above ground pool and had no idea what we were doing. We didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars on a poll cleaner and took a chance on this one. It works well! All you need for an above ground pool. Kids and adults alike enjoy watching Wanda sweep the bottom of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dilios

customer_reviews.title: Does not work... DON’T waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly made and doesn’t work! The “fin” doesn’t stay on. When I put Wanda in the pool it moved around in the same spots for a little bit and then quit moving and sat in one spot. It didn’t pick up anything off of the bottom of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Opalenik

customer_reviews.title: Wanda The Whale Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wanda is Amazing!!! She was easy to install and works well with our Coleman above ground pool and our saltwater system. We get a lot of debris from the cedar trees and other trees. Wanda has no problem keeping the pool sparkling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Weese

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective straight out of the box. Yes, I did send it back, but it's the hassle of packing it up and sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay D

customer_reviews.title: For an inexpensive vacuum, it does a fantastic job.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a replacement for the one that I had for 2 1/2 years and used almost daily in our semi inground pool. For the price I didn't expect it to last as long or do as good a job as it did. It cleans our 16' round pool bottom completely in around an hour and I live in the desert where we use the pool almost year round and a LOT of sand can blow in at once. I will probably order another when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat X

customer_reviews.title: Leave the hard work to Wanda the Whale!
customer_reviews.text: I've had swimming pools for 35+ years and wished I would have had Wanda the Whale the whole time. It takes about 30 minutes to clean the bottom of a 7000 gallon swimming pool! Definitely worth the money because I am saving so much time and energy!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darn good for the price. I am happy with it for sure. It’s not perfect but manages to get most of the junk at the bottom. I may push her a little at the end to grab an area or two that she missed but over all she makes a huge difference!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue James

customer_reviews.title: On my second one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Wanda ... first one I accidentally dropped and it broke. It does a decent job cleaning the pool bottom but tends to go in circles more often than it should. I end up having to steer it to the spots that were totally missed. The areas it does cover are nice and clean so otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict78

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It works great and I can keep our pool clean this year. Hasn't gotten hung up except if it's gone under the ladder so you have to check on it from time to time. Highly recommend buying the leaf canister attachment also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got to love the Whale!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Whale lol it saves me so much time cleaning my pool. I have a 24 ft above ground pool and it cleans the whole thing. I did have to lift the ladder out because it was getting wrapped around it. Definitely worth the money I have only had it this summer but I’m extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my pool cleaning tools
customer_reviews.text: Wanda works great IF you have a pool pump sufficient to make her cruise around the bottom of the pool. I have an above ground pool with a better than normal pump that came with it. Once the system is going and I close off all the other entry points for the pump Wanda takes off and cleans the bottom of the pool great. I am working to get my larger pump system repaired so that I don't have to put any effort into getting Wanda started and then it will work perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: but her feet aren't moving so she's essentially useless, which sucks because it's a cool product
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for his birthday on Feb 10th. We used her maybe once a week until April 14th, and she completely stopped working. Had a pool man come out and see if we had any clogs of anything. He couldn't figure out what was wrong. The suction is there, but her feet aren't moving so she's essentially useless, which sucks because it's a cool product. Going to pay $500 for the better pool cleaner since this doesn't come with a 90 day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Blacksonne

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month and seller no help
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Broke within a month. Seller no help at all said to contact manufacturer. Manufacturer requires contact during hours of 8-5 M-F EST and if you work it is almost impossible to reach them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for the first few times
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first few times, then it quit turning right. As it only turns left, it just does circles until the hose is coiled. I have contacted the manufacturer and will update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to waste money and time buy this. If not look for a different vacuum for your pool. Worked for exactly 10 seconds and now we can’t get it to do anything. I’ve seen many reviews with the same issue. I’m returning and now going to continue looking for a automatic pool vacuum. Thanks for much wasted time!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie dexter

customer_reviews.title: Wanda works well
customer_reviews.text: Wanda does the job well I have to change cartridges every day at first I rinse an reuse them until it's shiney clean..she scoots along having fun..I have an Intel above ground 5x18 pool and the filter that came with it is plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Lost suction pretty quick could never get it back even with changing tubing. Regretful purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: ... it a 3 star rating but it's not a bad product. It's just not reliable even with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I should probably really give it a 3 star rating but it's not a bad product. It's just not reliable even with a fairly good pump. I have an intex salt water system and it isn't quite enough to make this reliably operational. Sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't. But, it's better than nothing. Just too bad Hayward can't make the thing work better on slightly less flow.
customer_reviews.author: Timmayyy

customer_reviews.title: Ha Ha It works Wonderfully! He LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought this would not clean and he would have to put this in and then take it out and vacuum, Ha Ha It works Wonderfully! He LOVES IT!!!!!!! and he doesn't like a lot of things
customer_reviews.author: gary smith

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with Wanda!
customer_reviews.text: It's been consistently working great. Sitting on deck enjoying a pinacolada instead of vacuuming the old fashion way.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of money and time. It worked one time and could never get it to work again.
customer_reviews.author: Photo gal

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges tore liner
customer_reviews.text: I bought Wanda as a replacement for the Ladybug Pool cleaner I had that worked for many years. I put it in the pool and let it run for a week. When I came out I noticed my pool had lost some water. There was water pooling along the outside of the pool. I read the reviews online and saw it tore up other people’s liners. Sure enough, the bottom of Wanda had sharp points... Took me a few days to find all the slits at the bottom of the pool and patch them. I also filed off the sharp edges. Not sure why a company would continue to sell this without fixing the defect.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great pool vac!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this vacuum. We have a very large above ground pool and this does a fantastic job. So easy to use, doesn't hang up on the steps. We got the leaf collector attachment, which is great, too. It's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: but so far I am very happy with her
customer_reviews.text: Omg, buy this!! I am having a hell of a time getting my pool opened due to prior owners of my home not caring about the pool. I spent two hours vacuuming the other day and still didn't get everything cleaned. I got Wanda today and let her do her thing and I am very impressed with what she got up so far. I do need to get some extra hoses, but so far I am very happy with her. I didn't even bother with her tail because every review said it just falls off. Seriously though, I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: meagan marie

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well!
customer_reviews.text: This auto pool vacuum cleaner works pretty well. We did find that it needs help every now and then to circulate to parts of the pool farthest away from the skimmer basket. We'll still trying to figure out how many of the hose sections is ideal so it does not tangle on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander H

customer_reviews.title: Only Does Half  The Pool
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit, but it only sweeps half the pool. No matter how many times I move it to the other side of the pool, it goes back to the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan - Greenville, SC

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace our old and broken unit
customer_reviews.text: I think the old one cleaned a bit better, but it's hard to say. It definitely holds up to the Hayward name, so we're happy with the purchase and the kids love the fun character at the bottom of the pool!
customer_reviews.author: PSP

customer_reviews.title: Wanda Does All The Work For Me !
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner does SUCH a good job on my 18' round pool. It's never been this clean, and I can do other things while "Wanda" works ! Her tail DID fall off a couple times, but that's just ornamental.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanda the Whale earns 5 Stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone with an above ground pool. Wanda works well, cleans the pool as advertised. My above ground pool is a little larger than most, so I needed some additional hoses. Instead of paying $15 per section, I went ahead and bought another complete system. When my original Wanda bites the dust, Wanda #2 will be ready. I purchased the collection canister system and glad I did, because it was needed the way Wanda connected to my pool. UPDATE: Starting season #2 and Wanda is going strong. One of the best purchases I've made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Papakevin

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: Would not function in our pool without purchasing other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as in-ground
customer_reviews.text: Because I'm cheap, I bought a used one and put it in my concrete pool.it works just fine. I owned a Hayward Navigator that cost 4x as much years ago. This basically the same, but with shorter flaps and probably softer feet, both of which are replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: N. B. Wahlberg

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this prior to summer. Opened pool, ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this prior to summer. Opened pool, put this in the next day. It would not move. I read directions again. I had done everything correctly. Tried it again and this time it moved about 5 feet and stopped. It was months after I purchased it so I am stuck with it. No wrinkles in our liner, so I cannot figure out why it does not work
customer_reviews.author: GmsPA

customer_reviews.title: Bigger pump the better
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do the job! We have a 16x48 pool with the pump that came with it. Wanda is slow with it but works! We are planning on getting a sand filter soon! So Wanda will work better.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal J. Fink

customer_reviews.title: Hayward 900 Wanda the Whale Above-Ground...
customer_reviews.text: Works better than electric robot which only lasted one season,which was way over priced,tried the intec robot works but runs too fast stirring up algae two days running it still could get pool clean wanda the whale very good takes about 8-9 hrs to clean 30ft round pool and parts for are available to repair when the time comes for repair or just buy a new one for the price you cant beat it, love the whale
customer_reviews.author: Rita R.

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully in my pool(24’ round)
customer_reviews.text: I should of got her a lot sooner, going on two years now since my purchase. Works beautifully in my pool(24’ round). Make sure you have strong enough suction on your pump to get her moving. If she stops moving mid way thru cleaning that’s because you need to backwash the filter to get a strong suction again. I let her go for about two hours and she can get the pool nice and clean, just check on her periodically to make sure suction is still strong (can’t emphasize that enough!).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pinks

customer_reviews.title: Stop frequently.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work most of the time. Get stuck easily. A WASTE OF MONEY...
customer_reviews.author: AC-F

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Wanda
customer_reviews.text: Wanda really works well. There were a few spots left with some algae but overall she did a beautiful job and I didn't have to be home! I came home to a party perfect clean pool. Hard to believe she did this and is so affordable. Very easy to assemble, just put the hoses together and plug into your scimmer. With mine I have to make sure the hose is completely full of water and then she works like a dream swimming around the bottom. I thought she was going to fall over a few times, but she swims. Try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Csaw

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take on our pool after opening for the season, however, I've had some issues with it. I hadn't realized that you couldn't use this for large amounts of leaves on the bottom of the pool, so that may have been part of the problem. I've finally cleared them up with the regular pool vacuum, and am going to retry Wanda tomorrow. Do not buy this and expect it to work magic on a terribly nasty bottom of the pool. She would best be used for regular weekly vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: AliMarMillayde

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Intex 18' round pool
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased this automatic pool cleaner sooner. I spent an inordinate amount of time cleaning the pool manually until I purchased this device. This is what I learned from trial and error. If the pool is very dirty you should back flush and rinse often to keep the device working efficiently. A leaf catcher should be used with it, as the filter will fill with leaves and cause the device not to work. Also, if the device does not run rapidly over the pool bottom, you should 1. Backflush the pool filter, 2. Check the bottom of the device for clogs , and 3. Check the hose for air.
customer_reviews.author: T Chess

customer_reviews.title: When it works it does good, but it doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first couple months but now it moves for a few minutes then stops until you nudge it along. I would not recommend unless you want to sit outside and babysit it while it runs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not effective - need to vacuum after
customer_reviews.text: This pool cleaner does an extremely poor job cleaning my above ground 24' pool and I regret buying it. Every time I've used it, it has missed large parts of the pool and required me to vacuum manually. Instead of saving myself time, I have doubled my work. After giving it one last try, I've put it away for good.
customer_reviews.author: P W

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: If you are wondering if this is worth it - just buy one. You'll be glad you did. I dreaded having to manually clean our above ground pool every week or face the muck collecting at the center of our pool floor. This little whale is simple to set up and works great for weekly upkeep. Pool still needs a deep clean every once in a while, but this is a huge time saver that let's me enjoy our pool for once!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H

customer_reviews.title: need to know before ordering.... but works well!
customer_reviews.text: didn't work well at first. contacted the manufacturer and was instructed to ensure my filter was at the proper pressure level (or may need to be cleaned). I cleaned out the filter and Wanda was off and moving and cleaning well. Very happy with the purchase. Adding note: I have a 24' round above ground pool. the vac doesn't seem to get to the last 1-2' toward the outer edges of the pool. I had to use regular vac to complete the last parts. The whale definely does most of the work and should complete the process. not sure why it skips the points closest to the pool walls.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hochron

customer_reviews.title: this whale works great!
customer_reviews.text: set it and forget it. cleans great. even some large leaves. just remember to keep skimmer basket clean. set up was quick. no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ty K

customer_reviews.title: Only goes in circles
customer_reviews.text: This is our first year with our pool & we were recommended Wanda by a friend who swears by it. Wanda is cute & does a great job sucking everything up but she only goes in circles! Don’t waste your money. I’d rather hand vaccum our pool...
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Mulford

customer_reviews.title: Waist of time and money. Sent item back for refund.
customer_reviews.text: It just sat on the bottom of the pool and doesn’t move. Water is flowing through Wanda at high speeds but the device doesn’t move. Tried reinstalling it to make sure all air was out 3 different times but same results. Sent it back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: the tail would not stay on so I had to file down a couple of places where it connects to the body of the vacuum cleaner to get it to stay on other than that it works fantastic! I should’ve bought it along time ago
customer_reviews.text: This shipped very quickly and arrived without any issues however, the tail would not stay on so I had to file down a couple of places where it connects to the body of the vacuum cleaner to get it to stay on other than that it works fantastic! I should’ve bought it along time ago, really takes the work out of cleaning the pool.
customer_reviews.author: tkd722

customer_reviews.title: Junk!  Think twice before your buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This item is total junk and Hayward does not stand behind their products. Do not buy this item! We were very familiar with this type of above ground pool cleaner, we had one that lasted 10 years. Bought this brand new off of Amazon and it wouldn't work after 3 uses. So now, there's no option to return it to Amazon and Hayward says I have to pay a dealer to fix it. $45 just for them to take a look at it. Guess what, it's going right in the trash, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to clean the pool and it’s only a month old. Stops after a few hours. Very disappointed. Gets stuck in the same place constantly
customer_reviews.author: t

product_meta.title: Hayward 900 Wanda the Whale Suction Above-Ground Pool Cleaner (Automatic Pool Vacuum)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
You'll never be bugged by manual pool cleaning again. Wanda the Whale automatic pool cleaner provides you with easy, trouble-free operation. You never need to empty or replace debris bags. And because it works with your existing filtration system - no extra energy-consuming booster pump is required. Everything for simple 10 minutes or less installation is included - even the hoses. THIS cleaner loves to circulate. Plus, Wanda the Whale improves water circulation by acting as a moving main drain, pulling water from the bottom of your pool as it moves. Your water circulates and your pool stays cleaner - without the overuse of chemical sanitizers. This bug hangs out with a smart crowd. As part of a complete family of superior quality products designed to keep your pool at its sparkling best, Wanda the Whale is the smart alternative to the drudgery of manual cleaning. And it's from Hayward, the company that engineered automatic pool cleaning technology.
feature_bullets: Unique turbine/gearing system provides constant balanced water flow assuring quiet operation and gentle movement across the pool bottom
Advanced, contoured head design allows the steering pattern to be completed in minimal time
Installs in less than 10 minutes, without tools
Deluxe bumper ring minimizes friction for easy movement away from walls and resumption of the programmed steering pattern

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,050 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
